snippet: TOLLE--Beatrice, died peacefully at home on November 29, 2014 at age 91 surrounded by her family. Pre-deceased by her husband Morton and survived by her children Norman (Leanne), Meryl Cohn (Alexander) and Robert (Ellen) as well as eight grandchil...
lead_paragraph: TOLLE--Beatrice, died peacefully at home on November 29, 2014 at age 91 surrounded by her family. Pre-deceased by her husband Morton and survived by her children Norman (Leanne), Meryl Cohn (Alexander) and Robert (Ellen) as well as eight grandchildren and seven great-grandchildren. 1/3
